author: e9ab98e991ab
body:
<!--
 

-->

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
执行 Screenfetch 报错
```

# Expected behavior

```none
Screenfetch 无错误
```

# Actual behavior
尝试除以零。                                                                                                                    
所在位置 C:\Users\Administrator\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules\windows-screenfetch\1.0.2\Data.psm1:174 字符: 13            
+             $FreeDiskPercent = ($FreeDiskSizeGB / $DiskSizeGB) * 100;                                                   
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                    
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], RuntimeException                                                      
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : RuntimeException                                                                            
                                                                                                                          
尝试除以零。                                                                                                                    
所在位置 C:\Users\Administrator\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules\windows-screenfetch\1.0.2\Data.psm1:178 字符: 13            
+             $UsedDiskPercent = ($UsedDiskSizeGB / $DiskSizeGB) * 100;                                                   
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                    
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], RuntimeException                                                      
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : RuntimeException                                                                            
                                                                                                                          
                         ....::::       Administrator@PC-20190402CBIZ                                                     
                 ....::::::::::::       OS: Microsoft Windows 10 企业版 LTSC 64 位                                            
        ....:::: ::::::::::::::::       Kernel: 10.0.17763                                                                
....:::::::::::: ::::::::::::::::       Uptime: 0d 6h 7m 53s

:::::::::::::::: ::::::::::::::::       Shell: PowerShell 5.1.17763.316                                                   
:::::::::::::::: ::::::::::::::::       Resolution: 1920 x 1080

comments.author: fMichaleczek
comments.body: @e9ab98e991ab The error is about Screenfect, could you move your issue in the Windows Screenfect repository [here](https://github.com/JulianChow94/Windows-screenFetch/) ?

title: Modules\windows-screenfetch\1.0.2\Data.psm1:174
